pageContext.claim: “You look at other countries -- I won't mention them -- but other countries are going down 22 percent, 25 percent, 28 percent, and it's very hard for them. That makes it much more difficult with us.”
pageContext.analysis: Projections from the International Monetary Fund suggest real GDP globally will decline by three points in 2020. The largest overall decline they estimate will be in Italy with a loss of nine points.
